channel.title: Billy Lvl 3
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Billy Lvl 3"

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: i used the bone daddy summon and NSY team to get enough range. Took me a week to get him though

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: Powerful Potion just before rises the chances of success even with Nightfall.

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded:
Ran into this mission in season 1, passed it the 1st time, I was running as White Eyes.

I used Kido: Nightfall to get the range & strength needed to hit the 20d15

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: Make sure you're running A-Rank General missions. It won't pop up if you only go with one type of mission.

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: I'm curious if anyone has ran into this mission recently? I've been running A rank missions for 4 straight days and haven't seen the mission once.

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: I managed to level Billy to 3 myself … I think I'm stuck running lower-level missions for now, to give Emosuke a chance to catch up. Besides, I can think of a use for C-rank missions, if I can find deserving bingo targets…

item.title: Re: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: Flying Thunder God passes the mission, but it's just a normal level up check after that. I've flying thunder godded it a couple times only to find Billy still playing with his eye patches without adding a third.

item.title: Billy Lvl 3
item.content:encoded: Just an FYI for everyone, I ran into this mission yesterday and (since Kiji's a Legacy ninja) used the Flying Thinder God to auto-pass. And Billy leveled up to three, can't say if it's automatic but it was effortlessly done. Really annoyed me too since CLT is the only way I can get the range to run A ranks until I can get a final picutre of Terri for Shammy 2.
